posts.post_title: FS/Trade: T206 HOFers, SLers, and Commons SGC Reduced
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends. I would like to sell the following cards via Paypal gift or owed. Shipping included. Feel free to email for pics: [url]andygarden09@yahoo.com[/url]
Thank you very much for looking and have a great day!

Best,

Andy

Jennings Both Hands SGC 30 Pied. 350 $65
